text: A rockumentary is a documentary about rock music or its musicians. The word rockumentary is a combination (a portmanteau word) of the words "rock" and "documentary." Producer Bill Drake called the 1969 History of Rock & Roll radio broadcast a rockumentary. ==Examples of "rockumentaries"== ===Radio rockumentaries=== Title Creators Year Narrators Info The History of Rock and Roll Bill Drake, Gene Chenault 1969, 1978, 1981 Robert W. Morgan, Humble Harve Miller, Bill Drake , The Pop Chronicles John Gilliland 1969 John Gilliland, Sie Holliday, Thom Beck , ===Rockumentary movies=== Film Band Year Director IMDB Dont Look Back Bob Dylan 1967 D.
